summary_gpt: Larsen & Toubro Limited has paid interest of Rs.113.70 crore on its non-convertible debentures and completed full redemption of Rs.1500 crore on the maturity date, with no delays reported. The company has adhered to regulatory requirements and successfully managed its debt obligations as per the scheduled timeline.

Larsen & Toubro Limited has announced its participation in a virtual Q4/FY25 earnings conference call scheduled for May 8, 2025, to engage with analysts and institutional investors. The company is complying with SEBI regulations by informing the stock exchanges about this event.

Larsen & Toubro Limited has disclosed details of its non-convertible debentures (NCDs) outstanding as of March 31, 2025, including listing information and relevant circular links. The company has issued multiple tranches of NCDs across various dates, all listed on the National Stock Exchange of India.

Larsen & Toubro has confirmed the payment of Rs.154.50 crore interest on its non-convertible debentures due on April 28, 2025, with no delays or redemption activities reported. The company maintains regular interest payments and has provided detailed disclosures as per SEBI regulations.

Larsen & Toubro has made a full redemption of Rs. 2,500 crore worth of non-convertible debentures due on April 28, 2025, with interest paid as scheduled. The company confirms timely payment and redemption, indicating strong financial discipline.

Larsen & Toubro Limited has scheduled a board meeting on May 8, 2025, to consider and approve its audited financial results for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2025, and to recommend dividends if any. The company is complying with SEBI regulations by informing stakeholders in advance.
